chat_message: pressing through these startup screens, let's get back into the action
step_details:
**Situation:**
Dialog is showing the title screen copyright message "Pok√©mon FireRed Version PRESS START 2004 Game Freak inc." I pressed START once and it opened this dialog. I'm still at the title screen and need to advance through the menu to load my save.

**Reasoning:**
The first START press opened the title screen menu dialog. I need to use a_until_end_of_dialog to continue through any additional prompts and reach the main menu (Continue/New Game/Options). From there I can load my saved game.

**Context:**
This is standard title screen navigation. After pressing START, there may be additional copyright/warning screens before the main menu appears. Using a_until_end_of_dialog will efficiently advance through all of them until I reach the Continue option.

**Plan:**
1. Use a_until_end_of_dialog to advance through title screen dialogs
2. Once main menu appears, select "Continue" to load save
3. Resume gameplay in Oak's Lab and exit toward Route 1

**Observations:**
Still showing title screen dialog. Need to advance to main menu to load save file.
